title: "FOX-itis" Caused Jan 6? Trump's Blog Incomprehensible!?
itunes:title: "FOX-itis" Caused Jan 6? Trump's Blog Incomprehensible!?
description:
In episode 905, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Brodie Reed to discuss Jan 6th defendants claiming they have FOXITIS, Tucker Carlson's attempt at prolonging the pandemic, Floyd Mayweather versus the Paul brothers, hard seltzer companies gearing up for a war, Domino's The Noid mascot making a comeback, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Lawyer blames 'Foxitis' for his US Capitol riot client's actions, as another defendant derails hearings with profane outbursts
  2. Did Tucker Carlson Say Forcing Kids To Wear Masks Outside Is ‘Child Abuse’?
  3. Tucker Carlson: How many Americans have died after taking the COVID vaccine?
  4. Tucker Carlson's Fox News colleagues call out his dangerous anti-vaccination rhetoric
  5. Tucker Carlson’s worst vaccine segment yet
  6. Tucker Carlson's blatant lie about the COVID-19 vaccines, debunked
  7. ‘Tucker Carlson Tonight’ Sheds More Major Advertisers as Boycott Grows
  8. Marjorie Taylor Greene on Tucker's streaming show
  9. SEE IT: Bedlam Breaks Out At Floyd Mayweather, Logan Paul Exhibition Fight Press Conference In Miami
  10. Sorry, Snobs. Hard Seltzer and Canned Cocktails Are Blowing Up
  11. Domino's brings back the Noid to destroy robot delivery vehicles
  12. The Noid gets back into video games with Crash Bandicoot crossover
  13. An Oral History of the Noid: a Tale of Pizza, Guns, and Madness
  14. Death And Pizza: How Domino’s Lost Its Mascot
  15. 6 Obscure Facts About the Noid
  16. Domino’s is bringing back the Noid, a mascot that once drove a man to take hostages
  17. Pizza Workers Can’t ‘Avoid Noid'--Held Hostage 5 Hours
  18. AS DOMINO’S NOID RETURNS, THERE’S AN APPETITE FOR MORE BRAND MASCOTS
  19. LISTEN: DJ B.Cause - Tee Shirt (SpottieOttie Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
